meanings.definition: A rising and falling in waves.
meanings.sent1: The undulation of the ocean was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent2: The undulation of the snake as it slithered across the ground was graceful.
meanings.sent3: The undulation of the roller coaster made everyone scream with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The undulation of the music in the concert hall filled the room with emotion.
meanings.sent5: The undulation of the flag in the wind symbolized freedom and movement.

meanings.sent1: The undulation of the dancer's body was fluid and elegant.
meanings.sent2: The undulation of the heat waves distorted the view of the desert landscape.
meanings.sent3: The undulation of the ribbon in the wind created a playful dance.
meanings.sent4: The undulation of the crowd's cheers filled the stadium with energy.
meanings.sent5: The undulation of the road ahead seemed to never end as we drove through the hills.
